text: Street of Dreams is the second studio album by Swedish folk musician Sofia Talvik. Released in 2007, it features the single "It's Just Love", which was recorded as a duet by Talvik and Bernard Butler. ==Track listing== ==References== ==External links== * Street of Dreams by Sofia Talvik on Bandcamp Category:2007 albums Category:Sofia Talvik albums
title: Street of Dreams (Sofia Talvik album)
